title: Fast starts fueling Bengals
text:
Posted: 4:46 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015 Fast starts fueling Bengals Contributing Writer CINCINNATI — 
Fast starts don’t always translate to wins, but the Bengals have turned early-game success on both sides of the ball into a 4-0 start. 
The Bengals have scored touchdowns on three of their four opening drives and haven’t given up a touchdown while outscoring opponents 76-18 in first half. Continue Reading Read the complete story...
